ModMetaData.name: 4M Mehni's Misc Modifications
ModMetaData.author: Mehni
ModMetaData.description:
v1.0.0.0\n\n Adds various settings to customise your RimWorld experience.
Current features include: - Bugfixes for vanilla issues - Extend the time for pawns to undraft themselves - Change the threshold at which pawns retreat - Extend the time before you get kicked out of caravan maps - Never roll non-violents again - Show more info on plant yield (Thanks XeoNovaDan!) - A new alert to notify you of severe illnesses - Show what pawns are in a relationship when assigning beds - Disable messages for dying animals - who cares about Chicken #357 dying?
